articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: Goodbye to 'bags fly free' on Southwest, the last airline freebie in America - CNBC
articles.description: Southwest's customer-focused business model won it a loyal following during its half-century of flying.
articles.content:
Passengers check in for Southwest Airlines flights at Chicago Midway International Airport on Feb. 18, 2025 in Chicago, Illinois.

articles.author: Rod McGuirk
articles.title: American influencer apologizes for snatching Australian baby wombat following outrage - The Associated Press
articles.description: An American influencer who sparked outrage after posting a video of her snatching a baby wombat from its mother while in Australia apologized for her actions, saying she had acted out of concern for the young animal’s welfare. Australian authorities had threa…
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) An American influencer who sparked outrage after posting a video of her snatching a baby wombat from its mother while in Australia apologized on Saturday, saying she had act… [+2442 chars]
